ComicInfo.Title: Night of the Crimson Mage
ComicInfo.Summary: A Magician named Azaziah has found a way to mystically separate the Ghost Rider and Johnny Blaze into two completely individual beings. Aside from the obvious problems, it seems the demonic Rider has not been too happy about being forced into doing good deeds while confined in the prison of Johnny's body, and means to punish him for past grievances!
